options.optionText: How's it feel to have the whole room staring at your tits?
options.responseText: I don't mind the attention. At least these idiots are looking at something worth their time for once.

followUpOptions.optionText: Do you think any of them are about to bust a nut?
followUpOptions.responseText: If they do, I’ll give ‘em points for speed. Look at that one over there—he’s practically shaking. He’s either having an existential crisis or he’s about five seconds from a crisis in his pants.

options.responseText: Don’t be a prude, darling. You’ll miss all the fun
